name: Personalized News Digest (RSS to Email)
description:
Get a customized news experience with daily email digests tailored to your preferred sources. This automation delivers the latest updates directly to your inbox, keeping you informed on the topics that matter most to you.

Simply choose a news feed or blog that fits your interests, and we'll take care of the rest—ensuring each digest is personalized to your selected sources. Try using any of the suggested feeds below—just copy and paste them into the RSS module!
[MIT News](https://news.mit.edu/rss/topic/artificial-intelligence2)
[Wired Tech](https://www.wired.com/feed/rss)
[BBC News: Technology](http://feeds.bbci.co.uk/news/technology/rss.xml)
